sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM(
ZYFZR, ZYFZR_AQZZ, FGFZR, FGFZR_AQZZ, DZGDLD, DZGDLD_AQZZ, BMGDLD, BMGDLD_AQZZ, SDJGZR, MBZRS,
ID, STATUS, CREATED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED, UPDATE_TIME, ORG, ORG_TREE) values(
#zyfzr#, #zyfzrAqzz#, #fgfzr#, #fgfzrAqzz#, #dzgdld#, #dzgdldAqzz#, #bmgdld#, #bmgdldAqzz#, #sdjgzr#, #mbzrs#,
#id#, #status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#, #org#, #orgTree#)
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM SET STATUS='0' WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.ZYFZR AS zyfzr, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.ZYFZR_AQZZ AS zyfzrAqzz, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.FGFZR AS fgfzr, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.FGFZR_AQZZ AS fgfzrAqzz, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.DZGDLD AS dzgdld, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.DZGDLD_AQZZ AS dzgdldAqzz, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.BMGDLD AS bmgdld, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.BMGDLD_AQZZ AS bmgdldAqzz, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.SDJGZR AS sdjgzr, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.MBZRS AS mbzrs,
TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.ID AS id, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.STATUS AS status, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.CREATED AS created, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.UPDATED AS updated, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime from TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM where TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.ID=#id#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM
ZYFZR=#zyfzr# ZYFZR_AQZZ=#zyfzrAqzz# FGFZR=#fgfzr# FGFZR_AQZZ=#fgfzrAqzz# DZGDLD=#dzgdld# DZGDLD_AQZZ=#dzgdldAqzz# BMGDLD=#bmgdld# BMGDLD_AQZZ=#bmgdldAqzz# SDJGZR=#sdjgzr# MBZRS=#mbzrs#
ID=#id# STATUS=#status# CREATED=#created# CREATE_TIME=#createTime# UPDATED=#updated# UPDATE_TIME=#updateTime#
WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.ZYFZR AS zyfzr, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.ZYFZR_AQZZ AS zyfzrAqzz, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.FGFZR AS fgfzr, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.FGFZR_AQZZ AS fgfzrAqzz, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.DZGDLD AS dzgdld, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.DZGDLD_AQZZ AS dzgdldAqzz, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.BMGDLD AS bmgdld, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.BMGDLD_AQZZ AS bmgdldAqzz, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.SDJGZR AS sdjgzr, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.MBZRS AS mbzrs,
TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.ID AS id, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.STATUS AS status, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.CREATED AS created, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.UPDATED AS updated, TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime FROM TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM WHERE TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.STATUS = '1'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM WHERE TB_SYS_GRID_SYSTEM.STATUS = '1'
